title: OMDB Movie Details
desc: This project is to showcase my react and redux skills. I have used TypeScript along with React here. Also, this project consumes the REST Apis from Open Movie Database and it can be used for searching and viewing details of specific movies and TV shows.

title: Product Search
desc: This project aims to demonstrate my proficiency in React and MobX. TypeScript is used along with React. The project leverages MobX state management for handling product search, filtering, and display. It implements a real-time search functionality.

title: Geolocation APIs
desc: The purpose of this project is to demonstrate location-based features, including place search and locating nearby shops and attractions. The application utilizes the Google Maps and Google Places API to offer personalized routes and directions to the user
